name: TQN
body:
### Welcome to TQN
This is repository to capture some thoughts, quotes and notes from books I read. It's not meant to be a book review or summary just loose threads of ideas from each book. Depending on the material I might also note one thing I might now do differently based on what I have read. Welcome on this journey of life learning.

2016 Reading List

* The Art of Action by Stephen Bungay
* Becoming a Technical Leader by Geral Weinberg 
* Jack Welch and the GE Way by Robert Slater
* [The Riddle] (http://shoreason.github.io/2016/04/09/tqn-on-the-riddle.html)
* The Launch Pad by Randall Stross
* The Drucker lectures
* The SW airlines way by Jody Hoffer Gittell
* The Brain Advantage 

2015 Reading List

* The Personal MBA by Josh Kaufman
* Zero to One by Peter Thiel
* The start up of you by Reaid Hoffman and Ben Casnocha
* The Starbucks experience
* Talent is never enough by John Maxwell
* Tribes by Seth Godin
* Hacking Work by Bill Jensen and Josh Klein
* Think fast slow and slow (Summary) by Daniel Kahneman
* Power to Predict by Vivek Ranadive
* The 2 second advantage by Vivek Ranadive and Kevin Maney
* The Know-How by Ram Charan
* The Signal and the Noise by Nate Silver
* Decisive by Chip and Dan Heath
* The Hard Thing about Hard Things by Ben Horowitz
* The Art of the Start 2.0 by Guy Kawasaki
* Good Boss, Bad Boss by Robert I. Sutton
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
